column4: Installing VMware tools in ubuntu - am being asked "What is the location of the directory of C header files that match your running kernel?"  Anybody have a clue?
So no one knows the location of C header files used in the running kernel?

VMware responded "The header files in /usr/linclude/linux are generally for C libraries, not for the running kernel, ... "  is this the location, or is it likely that I do not have the kernel source files installed?
